mosinstall.name: 热门文章
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: This module shows a list of the currently published Items that have been viewed the most - determined by the number of times the page has been viewed.

param.name: catid
param.label: 分类ID
param.description: 设置要统计的分类 (可以是一组，每个ID用逗号隔开).

param.name: secid
param.label: 单元ID
param.description: 设置要统计的单元 (可以是一组，每个ID用逗号隔开).

param.name: cache
param.label: 启用缓存
param.description: 是否为本模块的内容使用缓存

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: 模块css后缀
param.description: 用来定义模块的css类型(table.moduletable)的后缀，这样允许模块使用单独的css风格
